title: (x) What the font? Bar Warfil, Barcelona - customized Pistilli Roman aka Eloquent {Florian, Rainer}
content:
Does anyone know this font? I think is Kepler bold, but I still have my doubts.

Thanks a lot

Gustavo
author: gsantos

comments.content:
Hi Gustavo,

this has been asnwered in [an older thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20100207003402/http:/typophile.com/node/58083): it’s a customized Pistilli Roman, available again as Eloquent.

I’ll move this thread to the appropriate place, the [Type ID Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20100207003402/http:/typophile.com/typeid).  
F

Hello Florian. Thank's a lot for your help. I swear that next time I put the question in the right topic.

Thank's again
